Parameters:

CloudProvisioningException - Indicates a failure to parse the given template.

convertToStringMap

public static List<Map<String,String>> convertToStringMap(List<Map<Object,Object>> originalNodesList)
It is easy to accidentally create GStrings instead of String in a groovy file. This will auto correct the problem for byon node definitions by calling the toString() methods for map keys and values.

Parameters:
originalNodesList - .
Returns:
the
